Articles.Content:
Yes, another replica. I\'m actually getting to like this trend, so I\'ll join in. I built an F-22. It turns rather poorly, and is a bit short. Not much else to say.

> ![P1uJK.png](http://i.imgur.com/P1uJK.png)

Nice. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I downloaded and gave it a try. The thing you did with the fuel tanks in fuel tanks is wacky. ???

Definitely does pretty well though. I managed to bring it around for a landing, but didn\'t stick it I\'m afraid.

> 
> Nice. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
> 
> I downloaded and gave it a try. The thing you did with the fuel tanks in fuel tanks is wacky. ???
> 
> Definitely does pretty well though. I managed to bring it around for a landing, but didn\'t stick it I\'m afraid.

Thanks! The fuel tank thing took a little messing around. Eventually I got it working, though. I actually forgot to attempt a landing before making this post..... Oops.
